price: De ki: Rabbimin rahmet hâzinesine eğer siz sahip olsaydınız, harcanır korkusuyla kıstıkça kısardınız. İnsanoğlu da pek eli sıkıdır!
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ أَنتُمۡ تَمۡلِكُونَ خَزَآئِنَ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّيٓ إِذٗا لَّأَمۡسَكۡتُمۡ خَشۡيَةَ ٱلۡإِنفَاقِۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ قَتُورٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law antum tamlikūna khazāina raḥmati rabbī idhan la-amsaktum khashyata al-infāqi wakāna al-insānu qatūran
